ComicInfo.Summary:
With Antonio still in tow, the squadron continues the dangerous campaign to push German forces out of Italy, where the battle begins to take on an even more vicious edge. Then Robin meets someone new, who may yet calm some of his own more violent tendencies- and even present him with a final choice between love and war. Available with Regular, Wraparound Covers by Thomas Aria, Good Girl Nose Art and Battle Damage Premium Covers by Matt Martin.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Tomas Aira | 1 | Wrap | Wraparound Cover | Tomas Aira | 2 | GGNA | Good Girl Nose Art Cover | Matt Martin | 3 | RI | Battle Damage Retailer Order Incentive Cover | Matt Martin | 4 |
